items.title: The Complete Guide to Construction Management
items.headline: The Most Essential Course for EVERY Construction Project!
objectives_summary: This course is helping construction projects save over 5 digits by applying the content provided!
Download a copy of the "Course Manual" to use as a reference for your construction projects. The manual includes all steps and processes involved in a project summarized for you in 50 pages

Understand construction contractual and financial models including the international form of agreement FIDIC, as well as payment processing methods, BOQ types, lump sum and provisional items, and more!

items.title: The Ultimate Microsoft Project 2013 & 2016 Mastery Course

Learn to effectively split projects into sub-projects.

items.title: 2021 PMP Mock Practice Tests
items.headline: PMP certification exam preparation based on 2021 latest updates - 380 questions including Agile

Practice realistic questions and scenarios similar to those encountered in the PMP certification exam.
Get access to complete solutions and explanations to all the questions so you know how you are performing across each domain and life cycle approach.
